title: victorious morgana
body:
QUESTION: is there a victorious Morgana skin shard in hex tech crafting?
i'm curious to know because it the one Morgana skin i don't own and i believe it also one of her best looking skins! 
if someone can answer my question i would love to know and if there isn't one is there any way i can get this skin?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This skin was given to everyone who reached gold or platinum ranking in season 4 of League of legends and is no longer available.

This is a limited reward skin and thus cannot be obtained through hextech crafting.
